column5: Glad you had a great day Joey, and ya, that is a cool shirt...I might just get the sattelite upgrade for this...wonder if it can be done next week???  Or even better I'll see if my brother gets it  Maureen
Hey Joey... just got home from work and Chuck told me about this...  Wow, just amazing... way to go... glad you had a good time...

Well i am sat here Just crying in my cup of tea!.......  ........lol  Awesome pics joey Looks like you had a blast you lucky bugga......Most certainly a day you will never forget.......& I so want one of them shirts....Thats a darn sharp looking shirt. Man i would never take it off.........LMAO  Will try to keep an eye out for the show xmas day for sure.  And again congrads hon and happy you had a great time....    Goes back to crying in her tea!  Nauti
Sounds like a fun time, and lots of free stuff is a good thing too...  Mike
Man, that is such an awesome shirt!! Way to go girl!!!!
You go girl.............Awesome now you are a celeb.  Best regards, Sam
Man a shirt and lures .....what a haul.  Art
Congrats Joey,I think your T-shirt collection has increased rather quickly.

that was really awesome you, you, you lucky gal!!!!!!!!!!! Couldnt have happened to nicer folk. Ive had the priv of meeting Dave a few times and he seems to be the real McCoy. Sara, our daughter, (LilBrick), has recieved all kinds of neat stuff from him as well. Good on ya for donning the OFC gear Joey. Our free WFN ran out, but in the new home Ive already arranged for its connection the day we move in...guess thats why we've got the truck for 4 days..it can sit in the driveway while we watch our very own Joey on the tube. WTG gal.you rock!!!!!!!!!!!

Hello Joey, Charmaine here, brickNblockESS Your looking really good gal---way to go.I was impressed with your appearence on the show--- "WAY TO GO, GAL" Can't wait to have you over for a visit at the our new place,I'm sooooo excited about the move. It should be a really crazy xmas, but well worth all the chaos, once it's all said and done. "MERRY CHRISTMAS TO YOU AND YOURS" And to all the other members of the OFC Charmaine

Bricknblockess, I love the name - that's priceless.  I can't wait to come up and see the new place also.  Enjoy it and call if you need any help.  I'm so glad things are coming around for you finally.  Thanks Joey
That is Awesome Joey!... I'll give ya $5 for the shirt right now! You done good, and I hope somebody can post the clip 'cause I doubt we'll get anything like that down here in Redneckville!
You'll have to pry it off my cold dead body G  It's kind of priceless if you know what I mean.  I think TJ is going to get a copy of it for us.  Thanks  Joey
congrats,joey....WAY TO GO..   thats so cool....

Hi Joey, Just wanted to say Hi and thanks for the great job you did it was great meeting you. I love talking with hard core fishing freaks like my self. Also wanted to wish all of you a Very Merry Christmas.  Regards, Dave Mercer  P.S you would not believe how many people what a shirt now !!!!! Maybe we should make a few available as a Casting for a Cure fund raiser ?

All I can say was that that was so cool and Dave is a great guy.  His camera crew and Tony the WFN manager were all really nice guys and great to deal with.  I felt alot calmer after meeting them and shooting the bull with Dave before filming.  We had to move a few things around in the house and go over the "script" and do tons of takes, but I think it turned out pretty good.  Dave pulled up and was wearing his Christmas Santa Suit    Here's the truck in my driveway.  People were honking as they passed.    Dave, in his hip santa suit talking with the crew and going over details.    Here's Dave and I after shooting.  He gave me this cool shirt    And I wore my OFC shirt the whole time TJ    They had the mic on me and we hid it well under the shirt, so it will be in the show  Its a bad picture of both of us, but oh well.    Both Dave and the WFN crew gave me lots of shirts, hats and baits.  They were truely awesome guys.  What an experience I won't soon forget.  Thanks guys, I enjoyed that and look forward to meeting you again.  They said it will air Christmas day and Boxing day starting at noon both days and will rerun periodically all day.  Woohoo, Sweet.  Cheers  Joey
Cool Joey!  Great pics and update for us.  We're all cheering for you!
What a great report  and pics. I'm happy for you Joey. Beauty shirt too! We'll talk later...I want the  'dirt'.  BTW, the shirt enhances your fishing jewellery :-)
That is so awesome Joey way to go girl !
Congrats Joey! Sounds like you had a riot! Where'd ya hide Tybo? HH
Great stuff Joey !!!  Really like that first shirt !!!
Very cool, looks a good time and some goodie, thanks for the pic's...
very cool.... thats something you will remember forever !
Thats great.... Im glad for ya... we will have to get someone to record it so we can show it to all!!  Actually Ill email the guys at the wfn to see if i can get the clip...
Congrats Joey! Sounds like you had fun.  Unfortunately I will not be able to watch the show because the local cable provider does not carry any of the good shows  Whopper
that's great  I will have to look for it
Thanks everyone,  and TJ, that would be cool if you could get a copy.  I'm going to have to unhook my dvd and rehook up my vcr so I can tape it.  Joey
Awesome!  Hey, can someone here tape it and post it here! I'm technically challenged!  Way to go Joey.  Clearly they wanted "Eye candy" for the show!
They're gonna put you in the Movies...  They're gonna make a big Star out of you...    Can't wait to see it !!!

I can't say I'm surprised, the WFN team is top notch and Dave is a phenomenally funny and personable guy.  I've never heard an amateur ever have anything but extreme positives about fishing with Mr. Mercer and the Cast for a Cure thing was a really great thing to do.  Congrats Joey, look forward to seeing the segment on the tube!  Charles
Thanks for the report Joey, can't wait to see the show.  Congrats and glad you had a great time.
very cool!  I have heard that Dave is an awesome guy!  Cheers!

Congrats Joey/ Mrs.Hollywood.lol . Looking forward to seeing the episode and who knows where this could lead. Sure know you could do a better job than Shelley and Courtney. Had the pleasure to meet Dave a couple of times, true ambasador for fishing.  Cheers, 1leg
Congrats!  Great pictures, and hopefully we'll get a clip on here so we all can view!  dk
Cool. Glad to hear it went well and I'll be watching the WFN for it.

Congrats Joey,way cool Beauty pics,ya look all decked out in that shirt Wonder if Tybo will get used to that ,stickers all over your Bigger boat than his and truck and full patched They be talking fishing with you  Glad you had a wonderfull day and a wonderfull experience
Way to go girl. You look simply faaaaaabulous
Id say to get your Autographs now.. while shes still talking to us.
WTG Joey.  Now you can get some sleep,Im sure you have missed a few hours.LOL
Joey thats awesome!!! I was happy to hear you were the one selected!!  I was going to apply but Mr Mercer must be a Leaf fan and kept Ottawa out of the contest
